name: The story of Heroku with Adam Wiggins, Heroku Co-founder and former CTO (The Changelog #513)
summary: This week on The Changelog weâ€™re joined by Adam Wiggins, co-founder and former CTO of Heroku, for an exclusive trip down Heroku memory lane. Adam and Jerod are both tremendous fans of Heroku and believe (to this day) they represent the apex in developer experience for delivering code to production. We talk through the ...
